duties_responsibilities.duty: Qualify leads from marketing campaigns as sales opportunities.
Contact potential clients through cold calls and emails.
Maintain a small subset of accounts over the phone.
Present our company to potential clients.
Identify client needs and suggest appropriate products/services.
Customize product solutions to increase customer satisfaction.
Build long-term trusting relationships with clients.
Proactively seek new business opportunities in the market.
Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) clients and Sales District Managers in the field.
Report to Sales Operations on (weekly/monthly/quarterly) sales results.
Stay up-to-date with new products/services and new pricing/payment plans.

education_certification.credential: Proven work experience as an Inside Sales Representative, Sales Account Executive, Business Development Rep or similar Sales role.
